casebody.data:
Peter Somers, Respondent v. The Metropolitan Elevated Railway Company, et al., Appellants. Decided April 16, 1891. Appeal by defendants from judgment entered upon findings and conclusions, made at special term. Julien T. Davies and Alexander S. Lyman, for appellants. Charles Gibson Bennett, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Dugro, J.

Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
